heading: Wednesday Night
text: Chance of showers, except likely in far northern NY.

heading: Thursday
text: Chance of showers south; likley north with summit-level snow showers possible.
temperature: Valleys mid to upper 50s southeast, upper 40s to mid 50s elsewhere

heading: Friday
text: Chance of rain or mountain snow showers, mainly north.
temperature: Valleys mid 40s to around 50 north, low to mid 50s south

heading: Saturday
text: Chance of a rain or mountain snow shower.
temperature: Mid 40s to around 50 north, and low to mid 50s in the south
